import React from 'react' import { NavLink, Outlet } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Layout() { const testMenuItems = [ { href: '/', title: 'Home' }, { href: 'dashboard', title: 'Dashboard' }, { href: 'product', title: 'Products' }, { href: 'categories', title: 'Categories' }, { href: 'api', title: 'API' }, { href: '', title: 'Contact'} ] return (
Shoesify
    {testMenuItems.map(({ href, title }) => (
  • {title}
    • ))}
) }
